reviews.name: Flower Lash Knockout Volumizing Mascara
reviews.reviewText: This is such a good buy! I always get excited when I find new drugstore products that are good buys! This mascara gives volume and length. The brush is great and it's not too "wet" and best of all the mascara doesn't get clumpy!! Love this.
reviews.title: Love this mascara!

reviews.name: Flower Lash Knockout Volumizing Mascara
reviews.reviewText: I have used every kind of mascara available - the department store paid way too much kind and the good ole Maybelline in the pink tube. The Flower Lash Knockout mascara blows them all away! Totally clump free, my lashes feel natural but have obviously been darkened and lengthened. Bye bye, thick clumpy, sticky lashes. This is my new go-to mascara!
reviews.title: Fantastic mascara!

reviews.name: Flower Lash Knockout Volumizing Mascara
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite mascara for strong lashes that don't look like I'm wearing mascara. It coats my lashes very well and doesn't clump in the least.
reviews.title: Noticeable difference, but still natural looking

reviews.name: Flower Lash Knockout Volumizing Mascara
reviews.reviewText: This mascara is not heavy like some of the other mascara brands and it doesn't clump. It feels like I'm not even wearing anything on my lashes. I will most certainly be buying this product again as a matter of fact I love this brand so much I'm in the process of changing all my cosmetics to the flower brand!
reviews.title: Great Mascara

reviews.name: Flower Lash Knockout Volumizing Mascara
reviews.reviewText: This mascara is fabulous! I have a hard time with mascara flaking on me. Not this one! It looks great all day! It is not too stiff and makes my lashes look full! This is my new favorite mascara. I have even tried expensive brands and this one is way better. No raccoon eyes either! No clumps! This is a 10!
reviews.title: Great Mascara
